搕字的基本解释

搕
kē
取。
敲击：搕烟袋。

搕
è
　ㄜˋ
以手覆盖。

搕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》烏合切，入合，影。］
以手覆盖。
[②]［kē］
［《集韻》克盍切，入盍，溪。］
(1)敲击。
(2)通“磕”。参见“搕2額”。

搕字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搕； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页446第26
【集韻】克盍切，音榼。取也。又擊也。　又【唐韻】烏合切，音罨。以手覆也。　又【集韻】乙盍切，音盦。義同。

搕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
搕字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
kē
take.
Percussion: Wipe the pipe.
Squeeze
è
ㄜˋ
Cover with hands.
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [è]
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, joined together, photo. ]
Cover with hands.
[②]［kē］
["Jiyun" Keqi cuts into the qi and the stream. ]
(1) Percussion.
(2) Through "knock". See "Push 2 foreheads".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　搕; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Pages: Page 446 and 26
【Jiyun】Keqiqie, sound tong. Take also. Hit again.　[Tang Yun] Wuhe cut, sound fluttering. Cover it with your hands.　[Jiyun] Yiqi cut, sound 盦. The same meaning.

2) брать, срывать (куш)
